price: ߓߊ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲ߘߊ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߞߎߡߊ߫ ߘߌߡߊ߲ ߠߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߞߊ߲ߘߊ߫ ߕߊ߲߬ߘߏ߬ߕߊ ߟߊ߫ ߛߌߟߊ ߡߊ߬
arabic: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wahudū ilā al-ṭayibi mina al-qawli wahudū ilā ṣirāṭi al-ḥamīdi
